tasks.task: Assist students in school due to improved food security
subtasks: Farmers increase crop production using drip irrigation
Calculate precise water and fertilizer needs with isotopic techniques
Introduce pilot project in two Zimbabwean villages
Drought previously hindered farmers' ability to afford school fees
Yield increases from five to six tons per hectare to almost triple
Children can now afford school fees and uniforms
Improved food security benefits entire communities

tasks.task: Discuss project's impact on farming practices
subtasks: Drip irrigation reduces water use by half
More efficient use leads to higher crop yields
